e_subtitle: Select the highlighted team members to listen to the team's conversation

scaleUpConclusion.e_text:
The painter's tape is now ready to go to market. The team conducts Launch, with Marketing/Business setting the Launch Control Plan.

Six months have now passed since initial Launch, and the team meets to share findings and observations.

conclusion.e_text:
The equipment issue has been addressed thanks to your investigation and the process capability has been improved.

Process capability can change over time for a variety of reasons. Your continued review of the manufacturing metrics with the team helps you identify issues before they can escalate to potential failure modes.
You check the collective FMEA tool to ensure all previously identified risks have been linked to a solution/intervention and are no longer a concern for the painter's tape.

questions.e_prompt:
Working with Manufacturing, you observe there is a poor process capability for roll length due to the equipment used.

Why would this be a cause for concern?

correct.e_text: All the available choices reflect real concerns for the product and process.

incorrect.e_text: All the available choices reflect real concerns for the product and process.

choices.e_text: Poor process capability means increased likelihood of out-of-spec material and scrap
Inconsistent roll length could cause customer dissatisfaction
The product packaging claims a specific length

questions.e_prompt:
The team prepares for the Design Review to move into Launch. The painter's tape has gone through design modifications in Development and product specifications have been updated.

What is the most important thing for you to recommend the team focus on during Design Review?

choices.e_text: Ensure none of the customer wants have been neglected

feedback.e_text: Ensuring customer wants have been properly identified and translated into product specifications is always important to recheck, but as the team prepares for Launch the most important consideration for you to establish from the Quality focus is all risks to product and process have been successfully mitigated.

choices.e_text: Ensure the best possible raw material selection is ready for production

feedback.e_text: Striving for the best raw material selections is always important, but as the team prepares for Launch the most important consideration for you to establish from the Quality mindset is that all risks to product and process have been successfully mitigated.

choices.e_text: Ensure risks to product and process have been successfully mitigated

feedback.e_text: To move into Launch successfully, you must operate from the Quality mindset to ensure that all previously identified risks to product and process have been successfully mitigated.

badges.text: Congratulations! Your efforts in translating customer needs into design specifications has earned you the Customer Advocate Badge!
badges.caption: Customer Advocate

badges.text: Congratulations! You have inspected a potential failure mode in the product/process by examining testing performance, uncovering a necessary redesign. You’ve earned the Test Evaluator Badge!
badges.caption: Test Evaluator Badge

badges.text: Excellent work! You’ve taken all the steps necessary after the painting tape underwent a necessary redesign, all while ensuring that the VOC remained amplified in the process. Your diligence has earned you the Robust Designer Badge!
badges.caption: Robust Designer Badge

badges.text: Fantastic! You worked with a primary supplier for the materials for the painting tape to ensure that issues with their quality system were addressed. This has earned you the Systems Master Badge!
badges.caption: Systems Master Badge

badges.text: Congratulations! You collaborated with the team to ensure that the VOC was correctly retranslated, and you’ve worked to document the process so that the painting tape can continue to be successful into its market life cycle. Your thorough efforts have earned you the Documentation Champion Badge!
badges.caption: Documentation Champion Badge
